name: 8-hydroxylinalool,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen 8-oxidoreductase
definition: (E)-3,7-Dimethylocta-1,6-diene-3,8-diol + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> (6E)-8-Oxolinalool + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 2 H2O
comment: the second step of two-step reaction (see R09925, R04366+R09924)
